author: kfogel
msg: * tools/dev/svn-dev.el
(svn-log-path-derive): Fix edge case buglet, thanks to Blair Zajac
for noticing.
Note that this code is a branch from code in my .emacs.  This copy is
maintained for other developers (Ben C-S and Mike P, anyone else?), so
if it's not doing the Right Thing for them, it should be tweaked until
it is.  Meanwhile, I've fixed this bug in my .emacs as well :-).

author: blair
msg: * www/project_faq.html (db-recover):
Mention that you need to run db_recover as the user that owns and
manages the database and not as root, because db_recover will
leave root owned files in the db directory that cannot be opened
by non-root users.  This has bitten me several times.

Take a pass through weblint and add missing

's.

author: blair
msg: * www/cvs-changelog.html:
Run dos2unix on this file to convert from DOS style to Unix style
end of lines.  Running svn diff -x -b shows no changes.
* www/project_faq.html:
Ditto.

author: kfogel
msg: Follow up to revision 2454:
* subversion/libsvn_wc/diff.c
(directory_elements_diff): Use iteration pool exclusively inside the
iteration.  With thanks to Justin Erenkrantz.

author: kfogel
msg: Take Justin Erenkrantz's suggestion for a new FAQ item:
* www/project_faq.html (db-recover): New question.
